properties.name: icon
properties.description: The icon to show on this action (optional)
properties.rawdescription: The icon to show on this action (optional)

properties.name: template
properties.description:
A template that should be rendered as the action. [[ActionWithTemplate]] actions are combined in a "add"-button dropdown. Note: As a Action is rendered in a

  • it is good practice to remove the wrapper node to not run into CSS issues. You can do so by defining the selector as a li: li[customExtension] (see: https://stackoverflow.com/a/56887630/923270 or https://stackoverflow.com/a/38716164/923270)
properties.rawdescription:
A template that should be rendered as the action. [[ActionWithTemplate]] actions
are combined in a "add"-button dropdown.
Note: As a Action is rendered in a <li> it is good practice
to remove the wrapper node to not run into CSS issues. You
can do so by defining the selector as a li: `li[customExtension]`
(see: https://stackoverflow.com/a/56887630/923270 or
https://stackoverflow.com/a/38716164/923270)
